item.title: Hollywood Sommeliers Pick the Best Rosés (and Whites) for the End of Summer
item.description: Don’t let the frivolous hue fool you: the town’s top somms take rosé very seriously these days. Their recommendations will elevate your end-of-summer parties — and keep your glass half-full well after
